channel.title: Yell and curse bugs!@!@!
channel.description:
I run a 562 rs2hd base server and the ::yell command is only for donator plus. i want for all players
same with the ::curses true its moderator plus but i need for all players. or i need to have the altar but when i go to spawn it its just blank. And yes i know im doing everything right its just not there.
Im not going to bother posing the code for yell because i have litterally tried everything from making it player.right == 0 and putting under that right category.
If you can fix ill love you forever. Please teamview meee <3
